reports.title: Database Summary
reports.query:
MATCH (n)
RETURN labels(n)[0] AS Type, count(n) AS Count
ORDER BY Count DESC

reports.title: Medication Adherence Classes
reports.query:
MATCH (m:Medication)
WHERE m.adherenceClass IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.adherenceClass AS Class, count(m) AS Medications

reports.title: Patients per Adherence Class
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Patient)-[:HAS_MEDICATION_DISPENSE]->(md)-[:OF_MEDICATION]->(m)
WHERE m.adherenceClass IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.adherenceClass AS Class, count(DISTINCT p) AS Patients

reports.title: Top 10 Conditions
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Patient)-[:HAS_CONDITION]->(c:Condition)
RETURN c.description AS Condition, count(DISTINCT p) AS Patients
ORDER BY Patients DESC
LIMIT 10

reports.title: Sample Patient Graph
reports.query:
MATCH path = (p:Patient)-[:HAS_MEDICATION_DISPENSE]->(md)-[:OF_MEDICATION]->(m)
WHERE m.adherenceClass IS NOT NULL
RETURN path LIMIT 30

reports.title: All Medications
reports.query:
MATCH (m:Medication)
RETURN m.description AS Medication, m.adherenceClass AS Class, m.code AS Code
ORDER BY m.adherenceClass, m.description

reports.title: Dispenses Over Time
reports.query:
MATCH (md:MedicationDispense)-[:OF_MEDICATION]->(m)
WHERE m.adherenceClass IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.adherenceClass AS Class, count(md) AS Dispenses

reports.title: Patient List
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Patient)
RETURN p.firstName AS First, p.lastName AS Last, p.gender AS Gender, p.birthDate AS DOB, p.city AS City
ORDER BY p.lastName
LIMIT 50

reports.title: Patient Demographics
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Patient)
RETURN p.gender AS Gender, count(p) AS Count

reports.title: Patients by City
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Patient)
RETURN p.city AS City, count(p) AS Count
ORDER BY Count DESC
LIMIT 10
